Properties.Value: Specifies the email address of the shared mailbox in Exchange Online that was created for email logging. The shared mailbox must be in the same tenant as Business Central.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the number of email messages that the job queue entry for email logging will get from Exchange Online in one run. By balancing this number with how often the job queue entry runs you can fine tune the process. If a message is not logged in the current run it will be in the next one.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
